page.title: 12 INDUSTRY-FUTURE IN LITCHAM
page.content: Our ideas of future development in the area of Litcham are to extend it so more modern housing can be built. More farming equipment is needed.This would produce more jobs for the unemployed.These workers can live in the new houses. Roads need improving as they are in such bad state especially small by roads.This is caused by lorries,farm machinery and bad weather. Litcham would be a good place for light industry as it is near coastal ports and near Fakenham.This would supply more jobs for youngsters and the unemployed. Litcham would need more amenities for children and adults.There are two pubs at the moment,if there were sports centres and clubs this would all mean that all the family could enjoy thenselves together.
